title: Ping in cmd is normal but in game HUGE difference.
body: I live in Hawaii so I do not have the best ping in general but this is beyond that. I have had this problem for a month or two now, I have played league for a little under a year. Durring this time my ping has remained a stable 120-160 depending on the time of day. Recently when I ping the league servers (104.160.131.1) My ping is such | http://imgur.com/a/80e6K | In game my ping goes from 140-2,000. | http://imgur.com/a/iQWgx | I can ping other websites such as google and stuff and ping is not spiking like it is in game.[Note sometimes randomly my ping is a stable 120-140 for a hour or so]  I am directly wired into the router. The problem persists even when I wire into the modem.

replies.body: You may be having network problems connecting to the game server, such as the direction your ISP is taking to reach us.  The traceroute you provided is good, but I recommend downloading [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)so we can get a better view of where exactly your connection is going.  I also recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities of local issues as well.  I'd like to help as much as I can, but also keep in mind that you do have that physical distance that could cause issues as well.  Let me know if you have any questions and hit me up with those logs!
